name: Baxter Jones
text: Great review plugin, easy to setup and install. Pull all your Booking.com reviews easily. Once you have your Booking.com page URL it works straight out of the box.

name: John Parker
text: Stop looking anywhere else! This is just a top notch plug-in. It just couldn't be any easier, and a great choice of options for styling etc. Pretty incredible really!

name: Allie Pereira
text: Easy to install with no complicated Booking.com API or other external details needed... does the job if you want a simple feed coming through. Very happy with it.

name: Ethan Cox
text: The only plugin which reflects your reviews and what your clients say about you. As a result, your sales grow! Recommend this one because I was searching a lot but didn't find any analogues.

name: Linda Lewis
text: I needed a simple plugin to add great looking reviews to my clients site. I was up and running in minutes. Super simple to connect to Booking.com and style the look and feel of the reviews.

name: Olivia Bennett
text: Very well thought out plugin. Don't even think about looking for another plugin. Easy, fast and not complicated at all. Tried a couple before, and they asked me for 100 things to do before installing them... Have it on all my sites.

name: Melvin Brea
text: It is an excellent plugin to integrate your Booking.com reputation. Beautiful, simple, versatile and easy to use. Great tool to boost your business.

name: Grabowski
text: Was looking for a plugin to show my rating on Booking.com and found this one. Very easy to set up. Just a couple of minutes and you are done. Highly recommended.

name: Essan Dee
text: I can highly recommend this plugin, it takes out all the hard slog of managing some critical security functions, and it's free which is great.

name: David Johnson
text: I use it for a full page on my website. I not technical, but found install and setup super easy. Page is handsome and presents my reviews in an attractive, easy to read design.
